author: nvoytish
body:
Raise in the issue:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/18605#issuecomment-302016415

the parameters of the RU CSC segment builder were not initialized in the right way, causing difference in reconstruction while running in multithreading mode.
The parameters were switched to local and are initialized properly.
title: RU CSC segment builder parameters initialization fix
